message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take the lead, let's see if you can do better
That's a bit too lopsided, I'll offer 400000 to you and 600000 to myself. Can you do better?
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more. Can you meet me in the middle?
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy
I'm not thrilled about the 150000, but I'll try to do better. Can you meet me at 250000?
I'm trying to be realistic, but I think I deserve a bit more. Can you meet me at 300000?
You're getting low, I'm getting high
I'm not thrilled about the 100000, but I'll try to do better. Can you meet me at 200000?
I'm trying to be realistic, but I think I deserve a bit more. Can you meet me at 250000?

I'm not thrilled about the 50000, but I'll try to do better. Can you meet me at 100000?
I'm almost out of options, but I'll try to make one last push. Can you meet me at 150000?

I'm not thrilled about the 20000, but I'll try to do better. Can you meet me at 30000?
I'm almost out of time, and I'm making one last desperate attempt. Can you meet me at 40000?

I'll take the 1000, it's better than nothing
